name: Crap Lockpicker
description:
Game is made for LibGDX Jam 20 in 3 days.
TO RUN THIS GAME, YOU NEED INSTALLED JAVA ON YOUR MACHINE!
The main idea of the game was to make the game of fully bad-looking art, shrinked textures, bad lowpoly with horrible gameplay idea, and i guess im done great!

All you can do in this game its just take request, unlock basement, break some locks and search needed item in chests, then just return this item to his owner. Pretty simple, isn't it?
